original_text: And Pharaoh's cup was in my hand: and I took the grapes, and pressed them into Pharaoh's cup, and I gave the cup into Pharaoh's hand.
korean_text: 내 손에 바로의 잔이 있기로 내가 포도를 따서 그 즙을 바로의 잔에 짜서 그 잔을 바로의 손에 드렸노라

sentences.original_text: And Pharaoh's cup was in my hand:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바로의 잔이 내 손에 있었고

sentences.original_text: and pressed them into Pharaoh's cup,
and I gave the cup into Pharaoh's hand.
